Querys.query: CREATE TABLE employee( employeeID varchar(10) not null, employeeName varchar(20), designation varchar(15), faculty varchar(15), department varchar(15), address varchar(50), qualifications varchar(20), gender varchar(10) DEFAULT 'Male', primary key (employeeID) )
insert into employee (employeeID, employeeName, designation, faculty, department, address, qualifications, gender) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update employee as e set e.employeeName = ?, e.designation = ?, e.faculty = ?, e.department = ?, e.address = ?, e.qualifications = ?, e.gender = ? where e.employeeID = ?
select e.employeeID from employee as e
